policy.title: luck-telling.com Policy for Acceptable Website Use.
policy.description: This acceptable use policy sets out the terms between you and us under which you may access our website www.luck-telling.com (our site)). This acceptable use policy applies to all users of, and visitors to, our site. Your use of our site means that you accept, and agree to abide by, all the policies in this acceptable use policy, which supplement our Terms of Website Use https://luck-telling.com/page/terms-conditions .
policy.prohibited_desc1: You may use the site only for lawful purposes. You may not use our site:
policy.prohibited_desc2: In any way that breaches any applicable local, national, or international law or regulation.
policy.prohibited_desc3: In any way that is unlawful or fraudulent or has any unlawful or fraudulent purpose or effect.
policy.prohibited_desc4: For the purpose of harming or attempting to harm minors in any way.
policy.prohibited_desc5: Bestiality , Child Pornography, Drugs, Incest, Necrophilia, Sex with Minors and Molestation.
policy.prohibited_desc6: To send, knowingly receive, upload, download, use or re-use any material which does not comply with our content standards as detailed below.
policy.prohibited_desc7: To transmit, or procure the sending of, any unsolicited or unauthorised advertising or promotional material or any other form of similar solicitation (spam).
policy.prohibited_desc8: To knowingly transmit any data, send or upload any material that contains viruses, Trojan horses, worms, time-bombs, keystroke loggers, spyware, adware or any other harmful programs or similar computer code designed to adversely affect the operation of any computer software or hardware
policy.prohibited_desc10: Not to reproduce, duplicate, copy or re-sell any part of our site in contravention of the provisions of our terms of website use.
policy.prohibited_desc11: Not to access without authority, interfere with, damage, or disrupt:
policy.prohibited_desc13: any equipment or network on which our site is stored.
policy.prohibited_desc14: any software used in the provision of our site; or
policy.prohibited_desc15: any equipment or network or software owned or used by any third party.
policy.interactive_desc: We may from time to time provide interactive services on our site (interactive services). Where we do provide any interactive service, we will provide clear information to you about the kind of service offered, if it is moderated and what form of moderation is used (including whether it is human or technical). We will do our best to assess any possible risks for users and we will decide in each case whether it is appropriate to use moderation of the relevant service (including what kind of moderation to use) in the light of those risks. However, we are under no obligation to oversee, monitor or moderate any interactive service we provide on our site, and we expressly exclude our liability for any loss or damage arising from the use of any interactive service by a user in contravention of our content standards, whether the service is moderated or not. Where we do moderate an interactive service, we will normally provide you with a means of contacting the moderator, should a concern or difficulty arise.
policy.content_desc1: These content standards apply to any and all material which you contribute to our site (contributions), and to any interactive services associated with it.
policy.content_desc2: You must comply with the spirit and the letter of the following standards. The standards apply to each part of any contribution as well as to its whole.
policy.content_desc5: Be genuinely held (where they state opinions).
policy.content_desc6: Comply with applicable law in the United Kingdom and in any country from which they are posted.
policy.content_desc8: Contain any material which is defamatory of any person.
policy.content_desc9: Contain any material which is obscene, offensive, hateful, or inflammatory.
policy.content_desc12: Promote discrimination based on race, sex, religion, nationality, disability, sexual orientation, or age.
policy.content_desc13: Infringe any copyright, database right or trademark of any other person.
policy.content_desc14: Be likely to deceive any person.
policy.content_desc15: Be made in breach of any legal duty owed to a third party, such as a contractual duty or a duty of confidence.
policy.content_desc17: Be threatening, abuse or invade another’s privacy, or cause annoyance, inconvenience, or needless anxiety.
policy.content_desc18: Be likely to harass, upset, embarrass, alarm, or annoy any other person.
policy.content_desc19: Be used to impersonate any person, or to misrepresent your identity or affiliation with any person.
policy.content_desc20: Give the impression that they emanate from us if this is not the case.
policy.content_desc21: Advocate, promote or assist any unlawful act such as (by way of example only) copyright infringement or computer misuse.
policy.suspension_desc1: We will determine, in our discretion, whether there has been a breach of this acceptable use policy through your use of our site. When a breach of this policy has occurred, we may take such action as we deem appropriate.
policy.suspension_desc2: Failure to comply with this acceptable use policy constitutes a material breach of the terms of use upon which you are permitted to use our site, and may result in our taking all or any of the following actions:
policy.suspension_desc3: Immediate, temporary, or permanent withdrawal of your right to use our site.
policy.suspension_desc4: Immediate, temporary, or permanent removal of any posting or material uploaded by you to our site.
policy.suspension_desc5: Issue of a warning to you.
policy.suspension_desc6: Legal proceedings against you for reimbursement of all costs on an indemnity basis (including, but not limited to, reasonable administrative and legal costs) resulting from the breach.
policy.suspension_desc8: Disclosure of such information to law enforcement authorities as we reasonably feel is necessary.
policy.suspension_desc9: We exclude liability for actions taken in response to breaches of this acceptable use policy. The responses described in this policy are not limited, and we may take any other action we reasonably deem appropriate.
policy.changes: Changes to the acceptable use policy
policy.changes_desc: Changes to the acceptable use policy We may revise this acceptable use policy at any time by amending this page. You are expected to check this page from time to time to take notice of any changes we make, as they are legally binding on you. Some of the provisions contained in this acceptable use policy may also be superseded by provisions or notices published elsewhere on our site.

record.title: 18 U.S.C. 2257 Record-Keeping Requirements Compliance Statement
record.desc1: By virtue of their locale the producers of the content contained within this website do not fall under the jurisdiction of American law.
record.desc2: The producers of this website have voluntarily complied with United States law concerning 18 United States Code 2257 and 28 Consolidated Federal Regulations Part 75 in order to assure those that are bound by these United States laws and regulations, that all visual depictions displayed on this website, whether of actual sexually explicit conduct, simulated sexual conduct or otherwise, are visual depictions of persons who were at least 18 years of age when those visual depictions were created. Government issued photographic identification confirming the foregoing is held by the Custodian of Records listed below. Such identification may or may not have been issued by the state or federal government of the USA.
record.desc3: All other visual depictions displayed on this website are exempt from 18 USC 2257 and 28 CFR 75 (if such visual depictions were subject to that law) because such visual depictions are not visual depictions of conduct specifically listed in 18 USC Sections 2256 (2)(A) to (2)(D), but are merely depictions of non-sexually explicit nudity or are depictions of simulated sexual conduct or otherwise exempt because the visual depictions were created before July 3, 1995.
record.desc4: BY VIRTUE OF SUCH VOLUNTARY COMPLIANCE, THE PRODUCERS OF THE ADULT ENTERTAINMENT CONTAINED IN THIS WEBSITE DO NOT ACKNOWLEDGE OR RECOGNIZE UNITED STATES JURISDICTION OVER THEM NOR DO THEY ATTORN TO THE JURISDICTION OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA.

faq.title: Luck Telling Frequently Asked Questions
faq.desk_answer1: Virt4Real is the calling application that allows you to make calls using your smart phone or your PC audio (similar to Skype), billed securely via credit card
faq.desk_answer2: Virt4Real works anywhere in the world using your PC audio (similar to Whatsapp, Skype), or you can use your mobile phone internet browser to call.
faq.desk_question3: Why is there no phone number for my country?
faq.desk_answer3: We use Internet Protocol calling (VOIP Telephony). You can use your mobile phone connected to the internet or your personal computer to make a call to Virt4Real.
faq.desk_question4: How will calls show on my phone bill?
faq.desk_answer4: It is not a phone call and does not appear on your phone bill. It will form part of your monthly Data Usage.
faq.desk_question5: Are my credit card and personal details safe?
faq.desk_answer5: Yes, absolutely. We have partnered with CCBill for processing all credit card transactions. We do not store your credit card details.
faq.desk_question6: How can I see how much I have spent?
faq.desk_answer6: Once logged in you can clearly see all the calls you have made, together with all call credits that you still have available.
faq.desk_question7: How do I top up my credits?
faq.desk_answer7: Once logged in you will see the 'Get Minutes' button. You will be given the option to top up via your credit card. You will also have the ability to add new card details.
faq.desk_answer8: Please note that credits do not expire and are purchased for the exclusive use on our site.. See VIRT4REAL T&Cs for details. Click Here
faq.desk_answer9: When you are logged in, call bundles are available at virt4real.com/get-minutes
faq.desk_question10: What happens if I run out of credits?
faq.desk_answer10: For ease of use, you will always be able to see your call credits on screen, even when you are on a call.
faq.desk_answer11: If you run out of credits your call will be terminated and you will need to purchase more credit before calling you Virtual Girlfriend back.
faq.desk_answer12: Your questions, comments and complaints are important to us. Please contact our customer care team via e-mail at itsupport@virt4real.com or call us between the hours of 8:00am and 2:00am 7 days a week on +44 20 8064 1488.
faq.desk_answer13: Depending on your concern you may be entitled to a refund, please see our terms and conditions https://luck-telling.com/page/terms-conditions for full information on our refund policy. Contact our friendly customer care team at itsupport@virt4real.com
faq.desk_answer14: All calls are recorded for caller listen back or for use in the dispute resolution
faq.desk_question15: Who Can Listen To My Recorded Calls
faq.desk_answer15: Only you, the caller and the Clairvoyant called, have access to the recorded call.
faq.inst_answer1: This service allows customers to instant message Virtual Girlfriends
faq.inst_answer2: You simply go to virt4real.com, log in and look for the button on a Clairvoyant profile that says “Message”.
faq.inst_answer3: Only the client and the Clairvoyantsee the messages.
faq.gen_answer1: luck-telling was launched in September 2020 during the Covid Pandemic to provide Virtual Relationships with real people across the globe using your mobile device or personal computer connected to the internet. The service has been designed to provide anonymity for all users and is a fantasy-based service where you can connect with real people and develop the relationship of your dreams, on your own terms.
faq.gen_question2: Are my credit card and personal details safe?
faq.gen_answer2: Yes, absolutely. We have partnered with CCSBill for processing all credit card transactions. We do not store your credit card details.
faq.gen_question3: How will charges appear on my card statement?
faq.gen_answer3: Charges will show discreetly on your card statement with no reference to anything of an adult nature.
faq.gen_question4: What’s a safe Password to use?
faq.gen_answer4: Ideally one you have never used elsewhere; this lowers the risk of fraud. Also, the password should be at least 8 characters in length, including upper and lowercase letters along with numbers in order to make it as difficult as possible for someone to guess.

get_minutes.your_privacy_description: we value your privacy very much. All our calls are handled with full discretion. To protect your privacy, charges are processed securely and will appear discreetly on your credit card statement. No mention of phone sex or any adult related term.

my_gallery.upload_image: Please upload image of dimension 250 x 250 px
